= iHOP - Information Hyperlinked over Proteins  =

For more information please read the paper:

 *  A Gene Network for Navigating the Literature. Hoffmann, R., Valencia, A. Nature Genetics 36, 664 (2004)

Or visit the iHOP web sites

 * http://www.ihop-net.org/ 
 * http://ubio.bioinfo.cnio.es/biotools/iHOP/ (web services description)

= How to use Uniprot DAS through the Biological Web Services Proxy =

To use iHOP through the proxy the following parameters should be added to the proxy URL:

*bwsp_service* = Uniprot_DAS

Name of the service

*bwsp_response_format* = row | json

Response format, could be the row xml format provided by the iHOP web service or JSON. 

*bwsp_callback* = callback name

If provided the response of the server is a JSONP function 

*bwsp_cache* = 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5

Cache time

 * 0) no cache
 * 1) 1 hour
 * 2) 1 day
 * 3) 1 week
 * 4) 1 month
 * 5) 1 year

*bwsp_rest* = Uniprot DAS url

Uniprot DAS url. See the following examples

= Examples =

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=uniprot_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/das-srv/uniprot/das/uniprot/types

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=uniprot_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/das-srv/uniprot/das/uniprot/features?segment=P04637

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=uniprot_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/das-srv/uniprot/das/uniprot/sequence?segment=P04637
